caption.p: Lattice energy as a function of volume of the rhombohedral and orthorhombic phases from DFT geometry optimizations at constant volume, with fits to the second-order Birchâ€“Murnaghan equation of state, for ( a) MnGF, ( b) CoGF and ( c) CdGF. Both energy and volume are given per formula unit. The fitted bulk modulus B is labelled on the graph; full fitted parameters are given as electronic supplementary material. (Online version in colour.)
